vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an MU-3 Mixed Use District on property zoned an MC-4 Multiple Commercial District, on the north side of Vantage Point, west of Greenville Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval
Z212-185(OA)
Note: This item was deferred by the City Council before opening the public hearing on August 10, 2022, and is scheduled for consideration on September 14, 2022.
